citances.sentence: When judgment on the substantive claims was delivered ( BHPB Freight Pty Ltd v Cosco Oceania Chartering Pty Ltd (No 3) [2009] FCA 1087) several issues were left for later consideration. Those issues are: (1) on what claim will BHPB elect to take judgment; (2) in what currency should judgment be given; (3) interest; and (4) costs. The parties have filed written submissions on each issue. Some raise nice questions of principle.
